title: The Travis Scott Burger Meal | McDonaldâ€™s
lyrics:
[Intro]
Wassup, world?
Yeah, you!
I'm Travis Scott,
This my McDonald's order
Follow me
[Verse 1]
Here's my Quarter Pounder
With lettuce, pickles, onions,
Ketchup, mustard, and bacon (Yeah)
[Verse 2]
Here's my fries
Sometimes I do this
Then I dip them in the BBQ sauce
[Verse 3]
Oh, yeah!
And my Sprite 
(It's lit)
Same order as back in Houston,
And you can try it, too
(Gotta go)
[Outro]
The Travis Scott meal
Just $6
Say Cactus Jack sent you
